positive_examples: This is an example of glider.
We observed glider in this context.
A typical case of glider would involve these features.
The concept of glider applies here.
A fixed-wing aircraft that is supported in flight by the dynamic reaction of the air against its lifting surfaces without engine power.
negative_examples: This is an example of helicopter, not glider.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Helicopter, or other types of Aircraft

definition: An unpowered aircraft that flies by exploiting rising air currents.
